section.name: celio_params
section.title: Celio's Method
section.help: Celio's method is an approximate method for computing asymmetry values over a range of times. It is particularly useful for larger systems of higher spins.

param.name: celio_k
param.label: Trotter number, k
param.help: Value used in the Trotter expansion.

param.name: celio_averages
param.label: Number of averages
param.help: When given a value MuSpinSim will randomise initial polarisation states and perform an average. This method is more approximate but much faster and reduces memory usage. It will also assume T->inf and zero magnetic fields. See the MuSpinSim docs for more info.
